com.hyleria.util

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hyleria.util.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides easy access to the time-based methods of the Bukkit API.
    Since:
    Jan/03/2017 (12:42 AM)

      • get

        public static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitScheduler get()
        Returns:
        the one and only scheduler instance for this server

      • end

        public static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitScheduler end(int id)
        Stops the requested task instantly
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the task
        Returns:
        the BukkitScheduler for this Server

      • endAfter

        public static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitScheduler endAfter(int id,
                                                            long ticksLater)
        Ends the task with the provided ID after a certain amount of time. (measured in ticks)
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the task
        ticksLater - how many ticks later to run something
        Returns:
        the BukkitScheduler instance this server is using

      • endAfter

        public static org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitScheduler endAfter(int id,
                                                            long ticksLater,
                                                            java.lang.Runnable callback)
        Ends the task with the provided ID after a certain amount of time (in ticks). Calls back on cancel
        Parameters:
        id - The job id
        ticksLater - How many ticks later
        callback - The callback to be executed on cancel
        Returns:
        the BukkitScheduler instance this server is using

      • loopUntil

        public static int loopUntil(java.lang.Runnable task,
                            java.lang.Runnable callback,
                            int interval,
                            int times)
        Runs the given runnable every x seconds (where x is the provided interval) for y amount of times(where y is the provided times)
        Parameters:
        task - The runnable to run
        callback - The callback after its run x amount of times
        interval - How often to run it in seconds
        times - How many times to run it
        Returns:
        The task id, in case you need to cancel it.

      • async

        public static int async(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Runs a task async to the main MC thread
        Parameters:
        runnable - The code to run
        Returns:
        The Bukkit ID of the task

      • delayed

        public static int delayed(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                          long delay)
        Runs a task after the desired amount of time
        Parameters:
        runnable - The code to run
        delay - The delay in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second)
        Returns:
        the Bukkit ID for the task

        public static int sync(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Runs a task synchronous to the primary Minecraft thread
        Parameters:
        runnable - The code to run
        Returns:
        the Bukkit ID of the task

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                        long delayBeforeRepeat,
                        long interval)
        Runs a task at the rate provided
        Parameters:
        runnable - the task to run
        delayBeforeRepeat - how long to wait between running the task
        interval - how often to run this task IN SECONDS
        Returns:
        the ID of the task
